alert.note: Alert for Taliaferro; Wilkes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 12:58AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Taliaferro and Wilkes Counties through 130 AM EDT... At 1258 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Washington, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Washington, Crawfordville, Tignall, Rayle, Sharon, Delhi, Holliday Park, Newtown, Danburg, Lyneville, Carters Grove, Jacksons Crossroads, Ficklin, Mallorysville, Lundberg, Robinson, Norman, Metasville, Floral Hill and Aonia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM EDT for east central Georgia.
